title: Permabanned because i called the game r%%%%%ed but because riot auto bans based on word
body:
Game 1
Pre-Game
Priçe: serious
Priçe: if someone is free
Priçe: but you have permanet skin shard already unlocked
Priçe: can you use it on the
Priçe: yeah
Priçe: ill adc
Priçe: ill prob feed as luc mid
Priçe: just got the zed
Priçe: chroma
Priçe: just wanted one game
In-Game
Priçe: ofcourse she chooses cait
Priçe: yea i noticed haha
Priçe: my skin rerolls are on point tho
Priçe: i got highnoon yesterday and riot graves today
Priçe: reroll 3 skin shards for a permannent random
Priçe: you have to land a q
Priçe: this is cancer
Priçe: she literally chose cait just to counter me
Priçe: actually sad people ttry this hard
Priçe: wdym
Priçe: no i dint
Priçe: you guyus are sad
Priçe: wh ywoudlnt i be
Priçe: literally fuckin r%%%%%ed
Priçe: stop using e for her trapos
Priçe: use it for his silence
Priçe: i cant
Priçe: how can i you are under twoer
Priçe: and thye pokee me
Priçe: ganki bot
Priçe: holy shit they havent warded
Priçe: you would be too if you were me
Priçe: yeah you dont jg either apparently
Priçe: :)
Priçe: ?
Priçe: i wasnt trying to block you
Priçe: i wastrying to kill her
Priçe: fiddle healing isnt the problem
Priçe: like im supposed to know who you are talkign to
Priçe: you didnt say anyones name
Priçe: what
Priçe: you havenyt he;lped me at all
Priçe: im still right wdym
Priçe: you guys are killing me
Priçe: morg help mid
Priçe: adn thats why i didnt
Priçe: i wouldnt catch her
Priçe: maybe if you edd me
Priçe: i couldve
Priçe: e'd
Priçe: you are so annoying
Priçe: I LITERALLY HVAE NO HELP
Priçe: she just complains aabout what i do wrong but never actually does anything
Priçe: what
Priçe: no that was fine
Priçe: if she was thewre and qd kha
Priçe: he was dead
Priçe: you wouldnt have killed us
Priçe: im not arguing with you im right
Priçe: we couldve 2v2
Priçe: you arent strong at all
Priçe: you arent good lol
Priçe: i had to 2v1 all game
Priçe: 0-3 pleas etell me how to play
Priçe: its not right
Priçe: thats why
Priçe: caits bad
Priçe: kill her
Priçe: 32nd ks
Priçe: 2nd
Priçe: lol
Priçe: why are you leaving the team
Priçe: you are actually a troll
Priçe: has heal and fleet
Priçe: she takes farm
Priçe: takes kills
Priçe: didnt help in lane at al
Priçe: because oyu sat under tower all game
Priçe: never using e on me
Priçe: you literally didnt help me at all in lane
Priçe: but its my fault
Priçe: you got it morg
Priçe: thought you were since you once again e'd urself
Priçe: yeah because once again you are never helping anyone
Priçe: see how theres 4 mid
Priçe: but you
Priçe: im done
Priçe: im reporting you
Priçe: and muting you
Priçe: says the one who hit 0 qs in lane
Priçe: how many minions did you q
Priçe: fuc kthis game
Priçe: literally i cant do anyhting
Priçe: when hes invisible and can one shot
Priçe: cool
Priçe: gg
Priçe: gg
Post-Game
Priçe: that morg trolled me so hard
Priçe: all lane phase does nothing
Priçe: but sit under tower bitching that my farm is low

replies.body:
While Necromancy may be handy (and sometimes needed) in video games, it's not the case for old forum threads. Please avoid using such magic and be mindful of how old threads are before posting.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

>Permabanned because I constantly got punished and had a tendency to treat other people like shit.

Fixed that for you.

who did i treat like shit this game? please tell me, the morg who was flaming me all game and trolling. maybe if riot ever actually showed the whole chat, but please tell me how you know so much about me that one game i get permad for literally being lesss toxic than 90% of the streamers on twitch

Well, to start with,  you didn't get perma'd for this single offense. You have either gone through the 3 previous tiers or escalated to the 3rd tier with ZT.

Now, granted it isn't the worse type of harassment:
 -calling people sad. This isn't the emotion sad you are using, but insult.
- literally fucking retarded.  Maybe you are talking about the game, but nothing really hints at it being about the game. Seeing as you were just talking about people; it is possible to assume you still were.
-condenscending because others aren't playing the way you want.  Mainly at the sup and jg it seems.
-Also complains about the other person not doing anything because they complain about him.
-Calling people a troll. Accomplishes nothing except actually feeding a troll "IF" they are one.
-more arguing

Guess what? Her actions don't give you a free pass to act just as bad or worse!

Wanna know a difference between the Streamers and you? They either aren't typing in game (as you can verbally say whatever), or they aren't being reported. :O. So weird, right?

You asked a question and I responded to it. But no, I am not really any type of troll. Well, maybe in Zolikings opinion I am with some of my off meta stuff; but that has been discussed by us.

Theybdo ban inters and trolls, just not in a speedy fashion that people would like.

> [{quoted}](name=LightningSky,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R7LNUKEL,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-10-17T01:18:58.948+0000)
>
> you arent agreeing with me. just stop responding

> [{quoted}](name=Imperial Pandaa,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=R7LNUKEL,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2018-10-17T01:13:51.359+0000)
>
> Well, to start with,  you didn't get perma'd for this single offense. You have either gone through the 3 previous tiers or escalated to the 3rd tier with ZT.
> 
> Now, granted it isn't the worse type of harassment:
>  -calling people sad. This isn't the emotion sad you are using, but insult.
> - literally fucking retarded.  Maybe you are talking about the game, but nothing really hints at it being about the game. Seeing as you were just talking about people; it is possible to assume you still were.
> -condenscending because others aren't playing the way you want.  Mainly at the sup and jg it seems.
> -Also complains about the other person not doing anything because they complain about him.
> -Calling people a troll. Accomplishes nothing except actually feeding a troll "IF" they are one.
> -more arguing
> 
> Guess what? Her actions don't give you a free pass to act just as bad or worse!
> 
> Wanna know a difference between the Streamers and you? They either aren't typing in game (as you can verbally say whatever), or they aren't being reported. :O. So weird, right?



Oh my god lets permaban this guy who's mad at being trolled by teammates great logic.  You realize how stupid that is?  How about....If people don't want to see chat, they disable it.  Because, you know, there is a language filter and a mute button.  But lets hand out permabans because we don't like what someone says.  hehe xd cancer
WOOO! FREE 10$!

Well, there is this mission to win a match without losing any towers. I figured ARAM would be a potentially good mode to do that in.

But hey, sure, go ahead and rank shame because I don't play rank heavily.
That kind of language, whether directed at someone else or not, is not ok. That is why it is considered zero tolerance.

riot wonders why this game is dying, then promotes streamers like tyler 1 and pays him to come to their events because he is the only reason they will stay relevant. But lets report and ban everyone who cusses or uses retard in the game even when directed towards no one,

You got permbanned because you spent the whole game tilting off the face of the earth and raging at your team.

And you have apparently done this before and ignored all warnings that you need to fix your behavior.

Until you accept that this is your fault and only you can fix it, this will keep happening everywhere. The extra-slow cases seem end up banned from that 'real life' thing as well.

i didnt rage at anyone the 0-3 comments you are bad are to the fiddle on the other team talking shit. If saying the other team is not good is reportable then this game is made for 10 year olds. I love how everyone who comments on this acts like they are high and mighty and don't get tilted by this game when its community is the most toxic ive ever seen. But please spend more time on the forums than in-game its obvious you dont play because you would have the same problem
Granted the circumstances, you should be permanently banned as well for speaking in this sanctimonious and condescending way.

Always curious when i make a coward so displeased they have to get on an alt, stalk months-old posts and talk trash. Why even bother?

Do it on your main so everyone can laugh at you.

but i forgot that inting is the way to go in this game
might as well just delete the enter key from working and just run it down mid every time

You done messed up<  not only for typing that word ofcourse

but the fact after you got off the 14 day ban you were an EASY target for a perma

and shoulda just not used chat to be safe, but you got caught by the perma goat,

loool rip
SpecialEdPetch#7246
nice, talk to the green guy  ( picture) :P
also the 14 day ban was like 2 months ago so i didnt think i would still get permad after that long

yes you would

the punsihments don't regress because of x time elapsed

they regress because of x time elapsed playing the game while not being toxic. and it varies from person to person depending on behaviour

Eh you were pretty toxic, I doubt this was your first offense if you got a permaban though.  I've been chat restricted 3 or 4 times in the last year for similar things and I haven't even received a soft ban so if you got perma'd then you must have done stuff before

you can say retard once in game and get 14 day ban, do it again and perma, after one thing of chat ban thats actually pathetic, you dont have to flame a single person, try it out just say the word retard nothing else and have someone report you and tell me how it goes

That cannot be true or you have just been unlucky.  That was not the only toxic thing you said, I have said that in games and have never had a ban on this account for it, chat restricted yes, but never banned

it is 100% true i will make a new account and show it to you at some point. I swear to god you dont have to flame anyone just trigger the auto ban based on words and you will get banned, most make sense as f*ggot and N*igger and kys but retard doesnt even compare to those and if you actually think it does then that is stupid because theres nothing wrong with calling someone mentally retarded when it literally means they are disabled.

>because theres nothing wrong with calling someone mentally retarded when it literally means they are disabled.

your mental gymnastics are nothing short of amusing

Yup their system is fucked , I feel you I recently got permaed as well. I recommend quitting this dying cancerous game filled with over sensitive kids, here's the thread I made: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/itU6Mx7z-did-i-really-deserve-to-get-perma-banned-i-genuinely-dont-get-it-i-want-your-opinions

Same here, not perma, but random 2 week out of nowhere with 0 previous restrictions. Sad because the community has potential, but yea kinda on the train of hoping the game dies because of this shitty punishment system now.
